+

+
+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)

+# Release 341 (XX Aug 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)
+* Add Iceberg connector.
+* Add {func}`human_readable_seconds`. ({issue}`4344`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Expose physical input bytes read statistics. ({issue}`4600`}
+* Report dynamic filters stats. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Reduce latency of how fast lazy dynamic filters are collected. ({issue}`4924`) 
+* Fix serialization of NULL values in structural types for old Presto clients ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying long timestamp type. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session 
+  time zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Add `optimizer_rule_stats` system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add Salesforce password authentication. ({issue}`4372`)
+* Allow to configure refresh period for system level access control with environment variables. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)

+* Reduce latency of how fast lazy dynamic filters are collected. ({issue}`4924`) 
+* Fix serialization of NULL values in structural types for old Presto clients ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying long timestamp type. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session 
+  time zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Add `optimizer_rule_stats` system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add Salesforce password authentication. ({issue}`4372`)
+* Allow to configure refresh period for system level access control with environment variables. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)

+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Reduce latency of how fast lazy dynamic filters are collected. ({issue}`4924`) 
+* Fix serialization of NULL values in structural types for old Presto clients ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying long timestamp type. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session 
+  time zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Add `optimizer_rule_stats` system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add Salesforce password authentication. ({issue}`4372`)
+* Allow to configure refresh period for system level access control with environment variables. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`) 
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary configuration properties `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp 
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for 
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC configuration property `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time 
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with the format specific properties. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Improve performance of partition fetching from Glue. ({issue}`4938`)
+* Fix invalid timestamp values for nested data in Text, Avro, Sequence File, JSON and CSV formats. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix query failure when reading a ORC ACID table with a filter, after the table underwent a minor compaction. ({issue}`4622`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)

+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)

+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)

+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+
+## JMX Connector Changes
+

+
+## Kafka Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kinesis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Fix delete when applied on table having primary key of decimal type. ({issue}`4683`)
+
+## Local File Connector Changes
+
+* Change the type of the `timestamp` column in the `http_request_log` table to `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries by computing aggregations within MySQL database.
+  Currently, the following aggregate functions are eligible for pushdown:
+  `count`,  `min`, `max`, `sum` and `avg`. ({issue}`4138`)
+  
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add `oracle.connection-pool.inactive-timeout` config property to specify how long 
+ pooled connection can be inactive before it is closed. ({issue}`4779`)
+* Add support for database globalization. ({issue}`4775`)
+* Resilience to momentary JDBC connection authentication issues with Oracle. (:issue:`4947`)
+ 
+## Phoenix Connector Changes
+
+* Fix overwriting of former value when insert is applied without specifying that column. ({issue}`4670`)
+
+## Pinot Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `REAL` and `INTEGER` types. ({issue}`4725`)
+* Add support for functions in pass-through queries. ({issue}`4801`)
+* Enforce a limit on the number of rows fetched from Pinot. This can be configured via the `pinot.max-rows-per-split-for-segment-queries` 
+  config property. ({issue}`4723`)  
+* Fix incorrect results for `count(*)` queries. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results for queries involving {func}`avg` over columns of type `long`, `int`, or `float`. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results when columns in pass-through query do not match selected columns. ({issue}`4802`)
+
+## Prometheus Changes

+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add Salesforce password authentication. ({issue}`4372`)
+* Allow to configure refresh period for system level access control with environment variables. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Allow to lowercase/uppercase matched user name in user mapping. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`) 
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary configuration properties `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp 
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for 
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC configuration property `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time 
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with the format specific properties. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Improve performance of partition fetching from Glue. ({issue}`4938`)
+* Fix invalid timestamp values for nested data in Text, Avro, Sequence File, JSON and CSV formats. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix query failure when reading a ORC ACID table with a filter, after the table underwent a minor compaction. ({issue}`4622`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+
+## JMX Connector Changes
+
+* Change the type of the `timestamp` column for tables in the `history` schema to `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kafka Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kinesis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Fix delete when applied on table having primary key of decimal type. ({issue}`4683`)
+
+## Local File Connector Changes
+
+* Change the type of the `timestamp` column in the `http_request_log` table to `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries by computing aggregations within MySQL database.
+  Currently, the following aggregate functions are eligible for pushdown:
+  `count`,  `min`, `max`, `sum` and `avg`. ({issue}`4138`)
+  
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add `oracle.connection-pool.inactive-timeout` config property to specify how long 
+ pooled connection can be inactive before it is closed. ({issue}`4779`)
+* Add support for database globalization. ({issue}`4775`)
+* Resilience to momentary JDBC connection authentication issues with Oracle. ({issue}`4947`)
+ 
+## Phoenix Connector Changes
+
+* Fix overwriting of former value when insert is applied without specifying that column. ({issue}`4670`)
+
+## Pinot Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `REAL` and `INTEGER` types. ({issue}`4725`)
+* Add support for functions in pass-through queries. ({issue}`4801`)
+* Enforce a limit on the number of rows fetched from Pinot. This can be configured via the `pinot.max-rows-per-split-for-segment-queries` 
+  config property. ({issue}`4723`)  
+* Fix incorrect results for `count(*)` queries. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results for queries involving {func}`avg` over columns of type `long`, `int`, or `float`. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results when columns in pass-through query do not match selected columns. ({issue}`4802`)
+
+## Prometheus Changes
+
+* Change the type of the `timestamp` column to `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## PostgreSQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries with predicates (the `WHERE` clause) by computing both filtering and
+  aggregations within PostgreSQL database where possible. ({issue}`4111`)
+* Fix handling of PostgreSQL arrays when `unsupported-type-handling` is set to `CONVERT_TO_VARCHAR`. ({issue}`4981`)
+
+## Raptor Connector Changes
+
+* Change timestamp internal storage to match Presto new semantics. Tables containing timestamp data written by a client not running in UTC 
+  will see timestamps adjusted to UTC. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `storage.shard-day-boundary-time-zone` configuration property, which was used to work around legacy timestamp semantics in 
+  Presto. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Redis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## SPI Changes
+
+* The `TIMESTAMP` type is encoded as a number of fractional seconds from `1970-01-01 00:00:00`, where every day is defined to contain

nodes.bodyText:
This is less about performance than about cost. We used to fetch 128 partitions per API call to Glue. We now fetch 1000. The query planning performance difference with and without patch was ~<5s (out of around 3m planning time, so... negligible).
This does lower cost and help avoid running into rate-limits. Not sure how that should be conveyed in release notes.

+* Allow to configure refresh period for system level access control with environment variables. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Allow to lowercase/uppercase matched user name in user mapping. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`) 
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary configuration properties `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp 
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for 
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC configuration property `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time 
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with the format specific properties. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Improve performance of partition fetching from Glue. ({issue}`4938`)
+* Fix invalid timestamp values for nested data in Text, Avro, Sequence File, JSON and CSV formats. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix query failure when reading a ORC ACID table with a filter, after the table underwent a minor compaction. ({issue}`4622`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+
+## JMX Connector Changes
+
+* Change the type of the `timestamp` column for tables in the `history` schema to `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kafka Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kinesis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Fix delete when applied on table having primary key of decimal type. ({issue}`4683`)
+
+## Local File Connector Changes
+
+* Change the type of the `timestamp` column in the `http_request_log` table to `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries by computing aggregations within MySQL database.
+  Currently, the following aggregate functions are eligible for pushdown:
+  `count`,  `min`, `max`, `sum` and `avg`. ({issue}`4138`)
+  
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add `oracle.connection-pool.inactive-timeout` config property to specify how long 
+ pooled connection can be inactive before it is closed. ({issue}`4779`)
+* Add support for database globalization. ({issue}`4775`)
+* Resilience to momentary JDBC connection authentication issues with Oracle. ({issue}`4947`)
+ 
+## Phoenix Connector Changes
+
+* Fix overwriting of former value when insert is applied without specifying that column. ({issue}`4670`)
+
+## Pinot Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `REAL` and `INTEGER` types. ({issue}`4725`)
+* Add support for functions in pass-through queries. ({issue}`4801`)
+* Enforce a limit on the number of rows fetched from Pinot. This can be configured via the `pinot.max-rows-per-split-for-segment-queries` 
+  config property. ({issue}`4723`)  
+* Fix incorrect results for `count(*)` queries. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results for queries involving {func}`avg` over columns of type `long`, `int`, or `float`. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results when columns in pass-through query do not match selected columns. ({issue}`4802`)
+
+## Prometheus Changes
+
+* Change the type of the `timestamp` column to `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## PostgreSQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries with predicates (the `WHERE` clause) by computing both filtering and
+  aggregations within PostgreSQL database where possible. ({issue}`4111`)
+* Fix handling of PostgreSQL arrays when `unsupported-type-handling` is set to `CONVERT_TO_VARCHAR`. ({issue}`4981`)
+
+## Raptor Connector Changes
+
+* Change timestamp internal storage to match Presto new semantics. Tables containing timestamp data written by a client not running in UTC

+* Add Iceberg connector.

+* Add [`reverse`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Remove support for political time zones in `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`191`)
+* Report dynamic filters stats. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Improve latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session
+  time zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Add [](optimizer_rule_stats) system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+* Fix issue where ``query_max_scan_physical_bytes`` session property was ignored if
+  ``query.max-scan-physical-bytes`` config property was not defined. ({issue}`5009`)
+* Fix incorrect sampling ratio when `TABLESAMPLE` is used with percentage fraction. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Correct rejecting queries using `TABLESAMPLE` with ratio being not a number. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Fail with an explicit error rather than `OutOfMemoryError` for certain operations. ({issue}`4890`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add [Salesforce password authentication](/security/salesforce). ({issue}`4372`)
+* Add support for interpolating [secrets](/security/secrets) into access-control.properties. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Add user mapping configuration to preserve lower case or upper case user names. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for HOURLY partitioning of tables. ({issue}`4968`)
+* Redact value of `bigquery.credentials-key` from logs. ({issue}`4968`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`2269`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+* Skip DeepArchive objects when `skip-glacier-objects` is set. ({issue}`5002`)
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary [configuration properties](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC [configuration property](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with the format specific properties. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Allow to optionally use cluster role in s3 mapping. ({issue}`4931`)
+* Remove support for bucketing on timestamp. ({issue}`4759`)

nodes.bodyText:
* Remove support for bucketing on timestamp. The definition of the hash function for timestamp
  incorrectly depends on the storage time zone and can result in incorrect results. ({issue}`4759`)

+* Add user mapping configuration to preserve lower case or upper case user names. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for HOURLY partitioning of tables. ({issue}`4968`)
+* Redact value of `bigquery.credentials-key` from logs. ({issue}`4968`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`2269`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+* Skip DeepArchive objects when `skip-glacier-objects` is set. ({issue}`5002`)

+# Release 341 (XX Aug 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)
+* Add support for variable precision `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4905`)
+* Add Iceberg connector.

+* Add [`reverse`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)

+* Improve latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)

+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`2269`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+* Skip DeepArchive objects when `skip-glacier-objects` is set. ({issue}`5002`)
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary [configuration properties](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC [configuration property](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time

nodes.bodyText: Generally you don't set it.  The default value is the right value for most cases (JVM default time zone)

+# Release 341 (XX Aug 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)
+* Add support for variable precision `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4905`)
+* Add Iceberg connector.
+* Add {func}`human_readable_seconds` function. ({issue}`4344`)
+* Add [`reverse`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)

+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Improve latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)

+  time zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)

+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)

+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)

+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Remove support for political time zones in `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`191`)
+* Report dynamic filters stats. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Improve latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session
+  time zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Add [](optimizer_rule_stats) system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+* Fix issue where ``query_max_scan_physical_bytes`` session property was ignored if
+  ``query.max-scan-physical-bytes`` config property was not defined. ({issue}`5009`)
+* Fix incorrect sampling ratio when `TABLESAMPLE` is used with percentage fraction. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Correct rejecting queries using `TABLESAMPLE` with ratio being not a number. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Fail with an explicit error rather than `OutOfMemoryError` for certain operations. ({issue}`4890`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add [Salesforce password authentication](/security/salesforce). ({issue}`4372`)
+* Add support for interpolating [secrets](/security/secrets) into access-control.properties. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Add user mapping configuration to preserve lower case or upper case user names. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for HOURLY partitioning of tables. ({issue}`4968`)
+* Redact value of `bigquery.credentials-key` from logs. ({issue}`4968`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`2269`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+* Skip DeepArchive objects when `skip-glacier-objects` is set. ({issue}`5002`)
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary [configuration properties](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC [configuration property](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with the format specific properties. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Allow to optionally use cluster role in s3 mapping. ({issue}`4931`)
+* Remove support for bucketing on timestamp. ({issue}`4759`)
+* Improve performance of partition fetching from Glue. ({issue}`4938`)
+* Fix invalid timestamp values for nested data in Text, Avro, Sequence File, JSON and CSV formats. ({issue}`4799`)

nodes.bodyText:
we decided that the fact Rubix is used is an implementation detail and user should not be concerned, just the same way as we treat Airlift.
Rubix caching -> Storage Caching
This is how we call it @ https://prestosql.io/docs/current/connector/hive-caching.html

+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with the format specific properties. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Allow to optionally use cluster role in s3 mapping. ({issue}`4931`)
+* Remove support for bucketing on timestamp. ({issue}`4759`)
+* Improve performance of partition fetching from Glue. ({issue}`4938`)
+* Fix invalid timestamp values for nested data in Text, Avro, Sequence File, JSON and CSV formats. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix query failure when reading a ORC ACID table with a filter, after the table underwent a minor table compaction. ({issue}`4622`)
+* Fix issue where queries could fail if Rubix caching was used and cached data was evicted during query execution. ({issue}`3580`)
+* Fix incorrect results when filtering on columns of `TIMESTAMP` type. ({issue}`5083`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+
+## JMX Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type in history tables to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4753`)
+
+## Kafka Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kinesis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)

+# Release 341 (XX Aug 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)
+* Add support for variable precision `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4905`)
+* Add Iceberg connector.
+* Add {func}`human_readable_seconds` function. ({issue}`4344`)
+* Add [`reverse`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Remove support for political time zones in `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`191`)
+* Report dynamic filters stats. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Improve latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session
+  time zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Add [](optimizer_rule_stats) system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+* Fix issue where ``query_max_scan_physical_bytes`` session property was ignored if
+  ``query.max-scan-physical-bytes`` config property was not defined. ({issue}`5009`)
+* Fix incorrect sampling ratio when `TABLESAMPLE` is used with percentage fraction. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Correct rejecting queries using `TABLESAMPLE` with ratio being not a number. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Fail with an explicit error rather than `OutOfMemoryError` for certain operations. ({issue}`4890`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add [Salesforce password authentication](/security/salesforce). ({issue}`4372`)
+* Add support for interpolating [secrets](/security/secrets) into access-control.properties. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Add user mapping configuration to preserve lower case or upper case user names. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for HOURLY partitioning of tables. ({issue}`4968`)
+* Redact value of `bigquery.credentials-key` from logs. ({issue}`4968`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`2269`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+* Skip DeepArchive objects when `skip-glacier-objects` is set. ({issue}`5002`)
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary [configuration properties](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC [configuration property](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with the format specific properties. ({issue}`4799`)

+* Fix query failure when reading a ORC ACID table with a filter, after the table underwent a minor table compaction. ({issue}`4622`)
+* Fix issue where queries could fail if Rubix caching was used and cached data was evicted during query execution. ({issue}`3580`)
+* Fix incorrect results when filtering on columns of `TIMESTAMP` type. ({issue}`5083`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+
+## JMX Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type in history tables to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4753`)
+
+## Kafka Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kinesis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Fix delete when applied on table having primary key of decimal type. ({issue}`4683`)
+
+## Local File Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4752`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries by computing aggregations within MySQL database.
+  Currently, the following aggregate functions are eligible for pushdown: `count`,  `min`, `max`,
+  `sum` and `avg`. ({issue}`4138`)
+
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add `oracle.connection-pool.inactive-timeout` config property to specify how long
+  pooled connection can be inactive before it is closed. ({issue}`4779`)

+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC [configuration property](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with the format specific properties. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Allow to optionally use cluster role in s3 mapping. ({issue}`4931`)
+* Remove support for bucketing on timestamp. ({issue}`4759`)
+* Improve performance of partition fetching from Glue. ({issue}`4938`)
+* Fix invalid timestamp values for nested data in Text, Avro, Sequence File, JSON and CSV formats. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix query failure when reading a ORC ACID table with a filter, after the table underwent a minor table compaction. ({issue}`4622`)
+* Fix issue where queries could fail if Rubix caching was used and cached data was evicted during query execution. ({issue}`3580`)
+* Fix incorrect results when filtering on columns of `TIMESTAMP` type. ({issue}`5083`)
+
+## Iceberg Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on Timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+
+## JMX Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type in history tables to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4753`)
+
+## Kafka Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kinesis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Fix delete when applied on table having primary key of decimal type. ({issue}`4683`)
+
+## Local File Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4752`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries by computing aggregations within MySQL database.
+  Currently, the following aggregate functions are eligible for pushdown: `count`,  `min`, `max`,
+  `sum` and `avg`. ({issue}`4138`)
+
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add `oracle.connection-pool.inactive-timeout` config property to specify how long
+  pooled connection can be inactive before it is closed. ({issue}`4779`)
+* Add support for database globalization. ({issue}`4775`)
+* Resilience to momentary JDBC connection authentication issues with Oracle. ({issue}`4947`)
+* Add possibility to force mapping of certain types to ``varchar``. This can be enabled
+  by setting ``jdbc-types-mapped-to-varchar`` to comma-separated list of type names. ({issue}`4955`)
+* Properly pushdown predicates for queries where number of conjuncts exceeded 1000. Previously query
+  would fail in such case. ({issue}`4918`)
+
+## Phoenix Connector Changes
+
+* Fix overwriting of former value when insert is applied without specifying that column. ({issue}`4670`)
+
+## Pinot Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `REAL` and `INTEGER` types. ({issue}`4725`)
+* Add support for functions in pass-through queries. ({issue}`4801`)
+* Enforce a limit on the number of rows fetched from Pinot. This can be configured via the `pinot.max-rows-per-split-for-segment-queries`
+  config property. ({issue}`4723`)
+* Fix incorrect results for `count(*)` queries. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results for queries involving {func}`avg` over columns of type `long`, `int`, or `float`. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results when columns in pass-through query do not match selected columns. ({issue}`4802`)
+
+## Prometheus Connector Changes
+
+* Change the type of the `timestamp` column to `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## PostgreSQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries with predicates (the `WHERE` clause) by computing both filtering and
+  aggregations within PostgreSQL database where possible. ({issue}`4111`)
+* Fix handling of PostgreSQL arrays when `unsupported-type-handling` is set to `CONVERT_TO_VARCHAR`. ({issue}`4981`)
+
+## Raptor Connector Changes
+
+* Change timestamp internal storage to match new Presto semantics. Tables containing timestamp data written by a client not running in UTC
+  will see timestamps adjusted to UTC. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `storage.shard-day-boundary-time-zone` configuration property, which was used to work around legacy timestamp semantics in
+  Presto. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Redis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## SPI Changes
+
+* The `TIMESTAMP` type is encoded as a number of fractional seconds from `1970-01-01 00:00:00`, where every day is defined to contain

+# Release 341 (XX Aug 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)
+* Add support for variable precision `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4905`)
+* Add Iceberg connector.
+* Add {func}`human_readable_seconds` function. ({issue}`4344`)
+* Add [`reverse`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Remove support for political time zones in `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`191`)
+* Report dynamic filters stats. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Improve latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session
+  time zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Add [](optimizer_rule_stats) system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+* Fix issue where ``query_max_scan_physical_bytes`` session property was ignored if

+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)

+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)
+* Add support for variable precision `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4905`)
+* Add Iceberg connector.
+* Add {func}`human_readable_seconds` function. ({issue}`4344`)
+* Add [`reverse()`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Add [](optimizer_rule_stats) system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Remove support for political time zones in `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`191`)
+* Report dynamic filters statistics. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Reduce latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session
+  time zone. ({issue}`37`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`37`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for certain join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+* Fix issue where ``query_max_scan_physical_bytes`` session property was ignored if
+  ``query.max-scan-physical-bytes`` config property was not defined. ({issue}`5009`)
+* Fix incorrect sampling ratio when `TABLESAMPLE` is used with percentage fraction. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Correct rejecting queries using `TABLESAMPLE` with ratio being not a number. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Fail with an explicit error rather than `OutOfMemoryError` for certain operations. ({issue}`4890`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add [Salesforce password authentication](/security/salesforce). ({issue}`4372`)
+* Add support for interpolating [secrets](/security/secrets) into access-control.properties. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Add user mapping configuration to preserve lower case or upper case user names. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)

+

+# Release 341 (XX Aug 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)
+* Add support for variable precision `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4905`)
+* Add Iceberg connector.
+* Add {func}`human_readable_seconds` function. ({issue}`4344`)
+* Add [`reverse()`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Add [](optimizer_rule_stats) system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Remove support for political time zones in `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`191`)
+* Report dynamic filters statistics. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Reduce latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session
+  time zone. ({issue}`37`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`37`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for certain join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+* Fix issue where ``query_max_scan_physical_bytes`` session property was ignored if
+  ``query.max-scan-physical-bytes`` config property was not defined. ({issue}`5009`)
+* Fix incorrect sampling ratio when `TABLESAMPLE` is used with percentage fraction. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Correct rejecting queries using `TABLESAMPLE` with ratio being not a number. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Fail with an explicit error rather than `OutOfMemoryError` for certain operations. ({issue}`4890`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add [Salesforce password authentication](/security/salesforce). ({issue}`4372`)
+* Add support for interpolating [secrets](/security/secrets) into access-control.properties. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Add user mapping configuration to preserve lower case or upper case user names. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for HOURLY partitioning of tables. ({issue}`4968`)
+* Redact value of `bigquery.credentials-key` from logs. ({issue}`4968`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`2269`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+* Skip S3 DeepArchive objects when `skip-glacier-objects` is set. ({issue}`5002`)
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary [configuration properties](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC [configuration property](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)

@@ -0,0 +1,163 @@
+# Release 341 (XX Aug 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)
+* Add support for variable precision `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4905`)
+* Add Iceberg connector.
+* Add {func}`human_readable_seconds` function. ({issue}`4344`)
+* Add [`reverse()`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Add [](optimizer_rule_stats) system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Remove support for political time zones in `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`191`)
+* Report dynamic filters statistics. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Reduce latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session
+  time zone. ({issue}`37`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`37`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for certain join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+* Fix issue where ``query_max_scan_physical_bytes`` session property was ignored if
+  ``query.max-scan-physical-bytes`` config property was not defined. ({issue}`5009`)
+* Fix incorrect sampling ratio when `TABLESAMPLE` is used with percentage fraction. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Correct rejecting queries using `TABLESAMPLE` with ratio being not a number. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Fail with an explicit error rather than `OutOfMemoryError` for certain operations. ({issue}`4890`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add [Salesforce password authentication](/security/salesforce). ({issue}`4372`)
+* Add support for interpolating [secrets](/security/secrets) into access-control.properties. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Add user mapping configuration to preserve lower case or upper case user names. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for HOURLY partitioning of tables. ({issue}`4968`)
+* Redact value of `bigquery.credentials-key` from logs. ({issue}`4968`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`2269`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+* Skip S3 DeepArchive objects when `skip-glacier-objects` is set. ({issue}`5002`)
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary [configuration properties](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC [configuration property](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with format specific properties: `hive.orc.time-zone`, 
+  `hive.parquet.time-zone`, `hive.rcfile.time-zone`. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Allow to optionally use cluster role in S3 mapping. ({issue}`4931`)
+* Remove support for bucketing on timestamp. ({issue}`4759`)
+* Improve performance of partition fetching from Glue. ({issue}`4938`)
+* Set user and group for new files on HDFS when writing to a table, to match table's (or partition's) user and group. ({issue}`4414`)
+* Fix invalid timestamp values for nested data in Text, Avro, Sequence File, JSON and CSV formats. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix query failure when reading an ORC ACID table with a filter, after the table underwent a minor table compaction. ({issue}`4622`)
+* Fix issue where queries could fail if storage caching was used and cached data was evicted during query execution. ({issue}`3580`)

+* Add {func}`human_readable_seconds` function. ({issue}`4344`)
+* Add [`reverse()`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Add [](optimizer_rule_stats) system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Remove support for political time zones in `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`191`)
+* Report dynamic filters statistics. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Reduce latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session
+  time zone. ({issue}`37`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`37`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for certain join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+* Fix issue where ``query_max_scan_physical_bytes`` session property was ignored if
+  ``query.max-scan-physical-bytes`` config property was not defined. ({issue}`5009`)
+* Fix incorrect sampling ratio when `TABLESAMPLE` is used with percentage fraction. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Correct rejecting queries using `TABLESAMPLE` with ratio being not a number. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Fail with an explicit error rather than `OutOfMemoryError` for certain operations. ({issue}`4890`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add [Salesforce password authentication](/security/salesforce). ({issue}`4372`)
+* Add support for interpolating [secrets](/security/secrets) into access-control.properties. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Add user mapping configuration to preserve lower case or upper case user names. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for HOURLY partitioning of tables. ({issue}`4968`)
+* Redact value of `bigquery.credentials-key` from logs. ({issue}`4968`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`2269`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)
+* Skip S3 DeepArchive objects when `skip-glacier-objects` is set. ({issue}`5002`)
+* Use temporary staging directory for write operation to sorted bucketed table. ({issue}`3434`)
+* Invalidate cached information on `GRANT` and `REVOKE`. ({issue}`4768`)
+* Add Parquet and RCBinary [configuration properties](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.parquet.time-zone` and `hive.rcfile.time-zone` to adjust binary timestamp
+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Add ORC [configuration property](hive_configuration_properties) `hive.orc.time-zone` to set the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did not declare a time
+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Replace the `hive.time-zone` configuration property with format specific properties: `hive.orc.time-zone`, 
+  `hive.parquet.time-zone`, `hive.rcfile.time-zone`. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Allow to optionally use cluster role in S3 mapping. ({issue}`4931`)
+* Remove support for bucketing on timestamp. ({issue}`4759`)
+* Improve performance of partition fetching from Glue. ({issue}`4938`)
+* Set user and group for new files on HDFS when writing to a table, to match table's (or partition's) user and group. ({issue}`4414`)
+* Fix invalid timestamp values for nested data in Text, Avro, Sequence File, JSON and CSV formats. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix query failure when reading an ORC ACID table with a filter, after the table underwent a minor table compaction. ({issue}`4622`)
+* Fix issue where queries could fail if storage caching was used and cached data was evicted during query execution. ({issue}`3580`)
+* Fix incorrect results when filtering on columns of `TIMESTAMP` type. ({issue}`5083`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when reading an ORC ACID table after the table had rows deleted underwent a minor compaction. ({issue}`4623`)
+
+## JMX Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type in history tables to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4753`)
+
+## Kafka Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kinesis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Fix delete when applied on table having primary key of decimal type. ({issue}`4683`)
+
+## Local File Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4752`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries by computing aggregations within MySQL database.
+  Currently, the following aggregate functions are eligible for pushdown: `count`,  `min`, `max`,
+  `sum` and `avg`. ({issue}`4138`)
+
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add `oracle.connection-pool.inactive-timeout` config property to specify how long
+  pooled connection can be inactive before it is closed. It defaults to 20 minutes. ({issue}`4779`)
+* Add support for database internationalization. ({issue}`4775`)
+* Resilience to momentary JDBC connection authentication issues with Oracle. ({issue}`4947`)

nodes.bodyText:
* Allowing forcing the mapping of certain types to ``varchar``. This can be enabled by
  setting the ``jdbc-types-mapped-to-varchar`` configuration property to a comma-separated
  list of type names. ({issue}`4955`)

+* Allow to optionally use cluster role in S3 mapping. ({issue}`4931`)
+* Remove support for bucketing on timestamp. ({issue}`4759`)
+* Improve performance of partition fetching from Glue. ({issue}`4938`)
+* Set user and group for new files on HDFS when writing to a table, to match table's (or partition's) user and group. ({issue}`4414`)
+* Fix invalid timestamp values for nested data in Text, Avro, Sequence File, JSON and CSV formats. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix query failure when reading an ORC ACID table with a filter, after the table underwent a minor table compaction. ({issue}`4622`)
+* Fix issue where queries could fail if storage caching was used and cached data was evicted during query execution. ({issue}`3580`)
+* Fix incorrect results when filtering on columns of `TIMESTAMP` type. ({issue}`5083`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when reading an ORC ACID table after the table had rows deleted underwent a minor compaction. ({issue}`4623`)
+
+## JMX Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type in history tables to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4753`)
+
+## Kafka Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kinesis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Fix delete when applied on table having primary key of decimal type. ({issue}`4683`)
+
+## Local File Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4752`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries by computing aggregations within MySQL database.
+  Currently, the following aggregate functions are eligible for pushdown: `count`,  `min`, `max`,
+  `sum` and `avg`. ({issue}`4138`)
+
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add `oracle.connection-pool.inactive-timeout` config property to specify how long
+  pooled connection can be inactive before it is closed. It defaults to 20 minutes. ({issue}`4779`)
+* Add support for database internationalization. ({issue}`4775`)
+* Resilience to momentary JDBC connection authentication issues with Oracle. ({issue}`4947`)
+* Add possibility to force mapping of certain types to ``varchar``. This can be enabled
+  by setting ``jdbc-types-mapped-to-varchar`` to comma-separated list of type names. ({issue}`4955`)
+* Properly push predicates down for queries where number of conjuncts exceeded 1000. Previously query
+  would fail in such case. ({issue}`4918`)
+
+## Phoenix Connector Changes
+
+* Fix overwriting of former value when insert is applied without specifying that column. ({issue}`4670`)
+
+## Pinot Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `REAL` and `INTEGER` types. ({issue}`4725`)
+* Add support for functions in pass-through queries. ({issue}`4801`)
+* Enforce a limit on the number of rows fetched from Pinot. This can be configured via the `pinot.max-rows-per-split-for-segment-queries`
+  config property. ({issue}`4723`)

nodes.bodyText:
* Improve performance of aggregation queries with predicates by pushing the computation
  of both the filtering and aggregations into the PostgreSQL server where possible. ({issue}`4111`)

@@ -0,0 +1,163 @@
+# Release 341 (XX Aug 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add support for variable-precision `TIME` type. ({issue}`4381`)
+* Add support for variable precision `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4905`)
+* Add Iceberg connector.
+* Add {func}`human_readable_seconds` function. ({issue}`4344`)
+* Add [`reverse()`](function_reverse_varbinary) function for `VARBINARY`. ({issue}`4741`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `timestamp(p) with time zone` with values of `p` other than 3. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Add support for correlated subqueries in recursive queries. ({issue}`4877`)
+* Add [](optimizer_rule_stats) system table. ({issue}`4659`)
+* Remove support for political time zones in `TIME WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`191`)
+* Report dynamic filters statistics. ({issue}`4440`)
+* Improve query scalability when new nodes are added to cluster. ({issue}`4294`)
+* Reduce latency when dynamic filtering is in use. ({issue}`4924`)
+* Improve error message when JSON parsing fails. ({issue}`4616`)
+* Remove deprecated `reorder_joins` session property. ({issue}`5027`)
+* Remove the `deprecated.legacy-timestamp` configuration property and the `legacy_timestamp` session property. ({issue}`4799`)
+* Fix serialization of `NULL` values in `ROW`, `MAP` and `ARRAY` types for old Presto clients. ({issue}`4778`)
+* Fix failure when aggregation query contains duplicate expressions. ({issue}`4872`)
+* Fix compiler failure when querying timestamps with a precision greater than 6. ({issue}`4824`)
+* Change timestamp operations to match the SQL specification. The value of a `TIMESTAMP` type is not affected by the session
+  time zone. ({issue}`37`)
+* Fix parsing failure of timestamps due to daylight saving changes. ({issue}`37`)
+* Preserve precision when applying `AT TIME ZONE` to values of type `TIMESTAMP`. ({issue}`4866`)
+* Fix failure when calling `EXTRACT` with `TIMEZONE_HOUR` and `TIMEZONE_MINUTE` for `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4867`)
+* Fix query deadlock for connectors that wait for dynamic filters. ({issue}`4946`)
+* Fix failure when `TIME` or `TIMESTAMP` subtraction returns a negative value. ({issue}`4847`)
+* Fix failure when duplicate expressions appear in `DISTINCT` clause. ({issue}`4787`)
+* Fix failure for certain join queries during spilling or when available memory is low. ({issue}`4994`)
+* Fix issue where ``query_max_scan_physical_bytes`` session property was ignored if
+  ``query.max-scan-physical-bytes`` config property was not defined. ({issue}`5009`)
+* Fix incorrect sampling ratio when `TABLESAMPLE` is used with percentage fraction. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Correct rejecting queries using `TABLESAMPLE` with ratio being not a number. ({issue}`5074`)
+* Fail with an explicit error rather than `OutOfMemoryError` for certain operations. ({issue}`4890`)
+
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add [Salesforce password authentication](/security/salesforce). ({issue}`4372`)
+* Add support for interpolating [secrets](/security/secrets) into access-control.properties. ({issue}`4854`)
+* Only request HTTPS client certificate when certificate authentication is enabled. ({issue}`4804`)
+* Add user mapping configuration to preserve lower case or upper case user names. ({issue}`4736`)
+
+## Web UI
+
+* Fix displaying physical input read time in detailed query view. ({issue}`4962`)
+
+## JDBC Driver Changes
+
+* Implement `ResultSet.getStatement()`. ({issue}`4957`)
+
+## BigQuery Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for HOURLY partitioning of tables. ({issue}`4968`)
+* Redact value of `bigquery.credentials-key` from logs. ({issue}`4968`)
+
+## Cassandra Connector Changes
+
+* Map Cassandra `TIMESTAMP` type to Presto `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`2269`)
+

+
+* Skip stripes and row group based on timestamp statistics for ORC files. ({issue}`1147`)

+  values to a specific time zone. For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. The default value is the JVM default time zone, for
+  backwards compatibility with earlier versions of Hive. ({issue}`4799`)

+  zone. ({issue}`4799`)

+* Fix issue where queries could fail if storage caching was used and cached data was evicted during query execution. ({issue}`3580`)

+* Fix incorrect query results when reading an ORC ACID table after the table had rows deleted underwent a minor compaction. ({issue}`4623`)
+
+## JMX Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type in history tables to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4753`)
+
+## Kafka Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kinesis Connector Changes
+
+* Preserve time zone when parsing `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE` values. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## Kudu Connector Changes
+
+* Fix delete when applied on table having primary key of decimal type. ({issue}`4683`)
+
+## Local File Connector Changes
+
+* Change `timestamp` column type to `TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`. ({issue}`4752`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries by computing aggregations within MySQL database.
+  Currently, the following aggregate functions are eligible for pushdown: `count`,  `min`, `max`,
+  `sum` and `avg`. ({issue}`4138`)
+
+## Oracle Connector Changes
+
+* Add `oracle.connection-pool.inactive-timeout` config property to specify how long
+  pooled connection can be inactive before it is closed. It defaults to 20 minutes. ({issue}`4779`)
+* Add support for database internationalization. ({issue}`4775`)
+* Resilience to momentary JDBC connection authentication issues with Oracle. ({issue}`4947`)
+* Add possibility to force mapping of certain types to ``varchar``. This can be enabled
+  by setting ``jdbc-types-mapped-to-varchar`` to comma-separated list of type names. ({issue}`4955`)
+* Properly push predicates down for queries where number of conjuncts exceeded 1000. Previously query
+  would fail in such case. ({issue}`4918`)
+
+## Phoenix Connector Changes
+
+* Fix overwriting of former value when insert is applied without specifying that column. ({issue}`4670`)
+
+## Pinot Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for `REAL` and `INTEGER` types. ({issue}`4725`)
+* Add support for functions in pass-through queries. ({issue}`4801`)
+* Enforce a limit on the number of rows fetched from Pinot. This can be configured via the `pinot.max-rows-per-split-for-segment-queries`
+  config property. ({issue}`4723`)
+* Fix incorrect results for `count(*)` queries. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results for queries involving {func}`avg` over columns of type `long`, `int`, or `float`. ({issue}`4802`)
+* Fix incorrect results when columns in pass-through query do not match selected columns. ({issue}`4802`)
+
+## Prometheus Connector Changes
+
+* Change the type of the `timestamp` column to `TIMESTAMP(3) WITH TIME ZONE` type. ({issue}`4799`)
+
+## PostgreSQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of aggregation queries with predicates (the `WHERE` clause) by computing both filtering and
+  aggregations within PostgreSQL database where possible. ({issue}`4111`)
+* Fix handling of PostgreSQL arrays when `unsupported-type-handling` is set to `CONVERT_TO_VARCHAR`. ({issue}`4981`)
+
+## Raptor Connector Changes
+
+* Change timestamp internal storage to match new Presto semantics. Tables containing timestamp data written by a client not running in UTC
